content: this no sew crochet fish keychain is a perfect gift for children and adults alike it s a really fun pattern that takes less than 30 minutes to make - plus it can be used as a backpack charm back to school gifts luggage tag stocking stuffer and so much more the pattern was made using dk yarn and a 2 75mm hook but would work with any yarn and the relevant hook this listing is for the ads-free print-friendly pdf but you can find the free pattern at https //chaicoffeecrochet com/fish-amigurumi-keychain-free-pattern/
